content.description: A linkup of To Crest in Violent Slumber and Slumbersome Ridge. Avoid the crux of the former by traversing right after the fifth bolt to finish on four bolts of 5.7 climbing. Good route for the slab enthusiast as it avoids the 5.11 roof pull on the left.
content.location: Start on the technical slab of To Crest in Violent Slumber.

climbs.name: The Validity of Foreverness Twisted in Dripping Black Streaks

content.location: This route is a harder variation Stemming Out Beyond the Grey

content.description: Climb up the 10+ techy black slab on the far left of the crag, then maneuver around the roof. The biggest holds are spread far and wide around the roof. Hard to onsight.
content.location: Farthest left route, starting on the steep slab.

content.description: There is no real crux. Climb the bolt line just to the right of the ridgeline and follow it to the chains which are above a small roof/block at the top. This route has very positive holds with lots of bolts - a good route for a beginning lead climber.
content.protection: 8 bolts and a set of chains at the top. The last bolt is shared with the route to the right (Autumnal Equinox).
content.location: Easy to find. It starts at the base of the ridge to the left of an old downed white log.

content.description: Clipping feels a little precarious since you are so close to the ground, this climb is often wetter than it looks. Needs 2-3 days to dry out. In the guidebook this is grouped with Alpina but I put it with Slumbersome because it does not dry that quickly.
content.location: It is half way between Alpina and Slumbersome Ridge.

climbs.name: Imbibing Knowledge From a Mortal Furnace

content.description: The entire thing is 11c, there isn't any rest and its one of the hardest 11c onsights you will have in the exits. It's got an awesome Hueco on it, that you don't see frequently in the exits.
content.protection: 4 bolts that have mixed metal washers
content.location: When approaching Slumbersome from the right, its the first route that is exposed to the sunlight that you will see.

content.description: Smooth slab with good friction and edges up to a tiny headwall with the chains.
content.protection: 4 bolts and chain anchor shared with Slumbersome Ridge
content.location: Scramble up the gully to the right of Slumbersome Ridge and climb the face.
